description:
Edit 14/02/22: We've listed more here: https://soonaverse.com/collection/0x6a7e17021ce880ea5022d107230ab4e112d2f815

The #TFTMIDAS1 again designed by the magical HyperR.eth and vesting 1,000,000 tokens at TheFansTogetherDAO ICO this NFT is created to help propel the DAO forward, to augment the operations and club purchase treasury. Same vesting bonus as the rest, 40% if you #HODL for 6 months and 100% if you #HODL for 12, this is for the serious sports fan who understands our mission and wants to show it.

The #TFTNFT collection brings more NFTs with utility to the #SOONAVERSE.

The Fans Together (recipient of the #IOTA DAOPIONEER grant) brings fans closer to teams through ownership and management of Pro Sports teams by our DAO.

A #TFTNFT is not only cool and designed by our own amazing Hyperr.eth but it vests tokens in #TheFansTogetherDAO at ICO and comes with a #HODL bonus of up to 100%.

These NFTs are the first possiblity to get a $TFT token and a way to support a project firmly rooted in the #IOTA ecosystem.

Come join our discord and read the whitepaper for more info and to chat with the team. Thanks for looking weâ€™d love your support!

Join our discord here: discord.gg/jHFCY2aGsv
name: #TFTMIDAS1
